links.*: J.R.R. Tolkien's Letters to Rhona Beare
Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
On [[14 October]] [[1958]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Rhona Beare]]'''.

This is one of the two letters that were printed in the ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's Letters to Rhona Beare]]'', being the original of [[Letter 211]].

* '''Difference from Letter 211''': Compared to this, Letter 211 omitted some marginal comments, replaced a paragraph with one from a draft (on the same point), and provided a prefatory note summarizing Dr. Beare's questions to which the letter is a response.<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]], [[Douglas A. Anderson]] (1993), ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Descriptive Bibliography]]'': Di2</ref>

==See also==
* [[Letter to Rhona Beare (8 June 1961)]]
